description: Beetroot adds a vibrant colour and delicious earthy flavour to these cheesy shortbreads. Sprinkle the topping on carefully to ensure even distribution.
name: Parmesan Shortbreads With Beetroot Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with the toasted pine nuts, Parmesan shavings, and micro cress. Serve at room temperature.
